name: Doodle Ships
description:
Doodle Ships (Now FREE!!)
Calling all battleship captains! Take to the high seas to command and do battle with your opponent. Select your fleet size and strategically place your ships (battleship, submarine, destroyer, aircraft carrier, patrol boat) on the grid. Take turns selecting a square on the grid to fire at your enemy. Once you make a hit, zero in for the kill! The first captain to sink all of their opponent’s ships wins!

Features in 1.2:
- All gameplay options from paid version are now available in free version!
- Minor bug fixes
- Removed timer from promotion screen
- Ads added to game screens

Features in 1.1:
- Minor bug fixes
- Ad supported free version
- Option to toggle sound on/off

Features in 1.0:
- Hand drawn doodle graphics
- Fun sound effects

A classic pencil and paper game done in “doodle” style.

Doodle Ships is one of the five mini games (Dots, Hangman, Tic Tac Toe and Word Search) found in Doodle Games. If you like Doodle Ships, check out Doodle Games in the AppStore! Doodle Games is a collection of some of your favorite pencil and paper games, brought to life on the iPhone.  This is the perfect game for your next road trip, boring meeting, or family gathering.
  
Play DoodleGames on your iPhone and save a tree!
